description:
Isamu and Zo Zo Zombie lure and capture the Tuna Fish Weeds to steal back Uncle Zomboâ€™s tuna! Samurai Zombie challenges Zo Zo to a real life duel. Zo Zo is in the sewers to retrieve Uncle Zombo`s coveted Golden Monkey after he accidently flushes it down the toilet. Dark Zombie hijacks a donut truck to use in an evil ritual, and with help from Zombie Bus, Zo Zo restores everything right in the donut universe.
Source: crunchyroll
